T02D1667:143b-1: shr'i padma na rte shva ri gu hya aartha dha ro bhy'u he n'a ma /
T02D1667:143b-3: dpal padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi gsang ba'i don rnam par dgod pa zhes bya ba /
T02D1667:143b-4: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1667:143b-5: rnam dag zhi ba zab mo'i chos //
T02D1667:143b-6: rgya cher drag shul 'od gsal zhing //
T02D1667:143b-7: rab rtogs bya ba grub pa'i tshogs //
T02D1667:143b-8: gsung bdag gtso bcas la phyag 'tshal //
T02D1667:144a-2: sangs rgyas kun gyi padmo'i sku //
T02D1667:144a-3: gar gyi dbang phyug sgrub pa'i thabs //
T02D1667:144a-4: de don 'dod pa'i don phyir bshad //
T02D1667:144a-5: rang bzhin dang tshul bzang las byung //
T02D1667:144a-6: gnyis med yon tan skye bas thob //
T02D1667:144a-7: skyabs 'gro byang sems sdom pa can //
T02D1667:144a-8: dbang thob dam tshig 'jigs med pa //
T02D1667:144a-9: theg chen gsang sngags blo gros mchog / gar dbang dkyil 'khor la dga' bas //
T02D1667:144a-10: phyi nang g-yeng ba rab bsal te //
T02D1667:144a-12: padmo skyed mos tshal dga' dang //
T02D1667:144a-13: chu bo dag gi mdo dag tu ;
T02D1667:144a-16: 'gro la snying rje chen po yis //
T02D1667:144a-17: bdag gzhan sgrol bar dam bcas nas //
T02D1667:144a-18: sbyor ldan nus mthu gsum bskyed pa //
T02D1667:144a-19: bdag dang 'gro ba spyang ba dang //
T02D1667:144a-20: dbang po'i dkyil 'khor mdun dmigs te ;
T02D1667:144a-21: / dang po bya ba'i rim rdzogs spyad //
T02D1667:144a-22: sgrib tshogs las grol byed pa yi //
T02D1667:144a-23: sems can tshad med blo yis gzung //
T02D1667:144a-24: bar chad bgegs bsal srung byed pa'i //
T02D1667:144a-26: phyogs bcur khro bo'i tshogs bskyed pa'i //
T02D1667:144a-27: cho gas rang gi las bzhi bsgom //
T02D1667:144a-28: thams cad spros bral de bzhin nyid //
T02D1667:144a-29: gnyis med byang chub sems dbyings las //
T02D1667:144a-30: 'gro la khyab pa'i thugs rje'i rgyan //
T02D1667:144a-31: stong gsal nam mkha'i shugs ltar 'byung //
T02D1667:144a-32: rdo rje sems dpa' skal bzang dpal //
T02D1667:144a-34: ae yam bam lam mam sum ram //
T02D1667:144a-35: aom na ma:sarba ta th'a ta aa nu r'a ga ya mi mandala la h'um bhr'um /
T02D1667:144a-36: chos 'byung nam mkha'i rang bzhin las //
T02D1667:144a-38: ri rab me 'od rgyan gsal zhing //
T02D1667:144a-39: kha dog dbyibs rgyan mtshan mar bcas //
T02D1667:144a-40: bde gshegs yon tan snang ba'i gnas //
T02D1667:144a-41: sna tshogs padma rin po che //
T02D1667:144a-42: 'khor lo sna tshogs rdo rje'i dbus //
T02D1667:144a-43: khang pa gru bzhi sgo khyud dang //
T02D1667:144a-44: rta babs bzhi yis mdzes byas pa //
T02D1667:144a-45: sa gzhi nam mkha' logs kyi phyogs //
T02D1667:144a-46: rigs kyi rin chen cher 'bar la //
T02D1667:144b-1: snga lnga'i rtsig pa dra ba dang //
T02D1667:144b-2: dra byed rin chen pha gus mtshan //
T02D1667:144b-3: padmas mtshan pa'i ka ba brgyad //
T02D1667:144b-4: rin chen mu tig me tog phreng //
T02D1667:144b-5: rgyal mtshan bla re rnga yab gdugs //
T02D1667:144b-6: 'dod yon lnga yi lha mo 'khyug / zla phyed rdo rje rin chen dang //
T02D1667:144b-7: ba dan dril bu'i sgra snyan sgrogs //
T02D1667:144b-9: padma mtshan mu khyud padmo'i phreng //
T02D1667:144b-10: mtshams su bum pa gang ba bzhi //
T02D1667:144b-11: rigs kyi mtshan mas rnam par mdzes //
T02D1667:144b-13: khyams dang sgo sogs padma'i gdan //
T02D1667:144b-14: phyi rol ra ba rim gsum brgyan //
T02D1667:144b-15: phyogs mtshams dur khrod chen po brgyad //
T02D1667:144b-16: de mtha' 'dod pa'i longs spyod dang //
T02D1667:144b-17: rdo rje rab bas bskor ba'o //
T02D1667:144b-19: chags pa'i nyes pas mi gos pa //
T02D1667:144b-20: rnal 'byor ldan pa de bzhin du //
T02D1667:144b-21: gnas kyi nyes pas yong mi gos //
T02D1667:144b-22: rnam thar sgo bzhi snyoms 'jug gi //
T02D1667:144b-23: 'gog gnas gdul bya'i don bral la //
T02D1667:144b-24: phyogs bcu'i rgyal bas bskul mdzad de //
T02D1667:144b-25: mngon byang lnga yis rdzogs skur gyur //
T02D1667:144b-26: sems dang sems dpa'i ting 'dzin dang //
T02D1667:144b-27: byang chub spyod pa sna tshogs nyid //
T02D1667:144b-28: de bzhin bdud dang bdud las rgyal //
T02D1667:144b-29: de ni byang chub sangs rgyas yin //
T02D1667:144b-30: aom ma h'a su kha badzra satva a'a:/
T02D1667:144b-31: dza: h'um bam ho: su ra te stvam /
T02D1667:144b-32: rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen sku //
T02D1667:144b-33: dkar zhing dmar ba'i mdangs gsal 'od //
T02D1667:144b-34: zhal bzhi rnam gzigs phyag bzhi pa //
T02D1667:144b-35: dang po rdo rje rtse lnga 'bar //
T02D1667:144b-36: rdo rje kha tv'am dril bcas 'khrol //
T02D1667:144b-37: 'og ma gnyis kyis mda' dang gzhu //
T02D1667:144b-38: mtshan dpe phyag rgya lnga yis mdzes //
T02D1667:144b-39: stod g-yogs dar dkar gser ris can //
T02D1667:144b-40: sku smad tshi gu'i na bza' la //
T02D1667:144b-41: rin chen phreng ba'i rked chings can //
T02D1667:144b-42: mgur chu do shal dpung rgyan dang //
T02D1667:144b-43: phyag zhabs gadu bu se mo do //
T02D1667:144b-44: rdo rje rtse lnga'i rgya ni //
T02D1667:144b-45: gnas lnga dag tu gtugs byas te //
T02D1667:144b-46: sngags kyis bde gshegs thams cad kyi //
T02D1667:144b-47: sku gsung thugs sogs rnam par bsam //
T02D1667:144b-48: aom na ma:sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya w'a
T02D1667:145a-0: ka tsitta guna karma badzra sva bh'a ba @145a *
T02D1667:145a-2: lus kyi ba spu'i gnas rnams su //
T02D1667:145a-3: dkyil 'khor drug gi rdul phran gnas //
T02D1667:145a-4: mkha' dbyings dbang phyug rgya yis //
T02D1667:145a-5: gnas kun byin gyis brlab par bya //
T02D1667:145a-6: aom dharma dh'a tu badzra sva bh'a ba a'atmako& ham /
T02D1667:145a-7: mthe bong sems dpa'i skyil mo krung //
T02D1667:145a-8: mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dgug / gung mo gnyis ni mnyam par sbyar //
T02D1667:145a-9: lhag ma rdo rje thal mo'i 'od //
T02D1667:145a-10: rdo rje rin chen phyag rgya 'di //
T02D1667:145a-11: rang byung rnams kyis dbang bskur ba'o //
T02D1667:145a-13: ratna m'a la aa bhi shinytsa tram /
T02D1667:145a-14: pat lam aa bhi shinytsa aom /
T02D1667:145a-16: / byin brlabs rigs kyi dpu rgyan gyi //
T02D1667:145a-17: rgyu yi mgon po rdo rje 'chang //
T02D1667:145a-18: dpal ldan dpadma gar dbang sku //
T02D1667:145a-19: cha lugs mtshan ma rgyan gsal gyur //
T02D1667:145a-20: sku mdog dkar la dmar bzhang chags //
T02D1667:145a-21: zhal mang brgya phyed phyag gis mdzes //
T02D1667:145a-22: g-yas kyis padma rdo rje dang //
T02D1667:145a-23: 'khor lo rin chen dbyug sogs kyis //
T02D1667:145a-24: mtshan zhing g-yon pa'i phyag dag gis //
T02D1667:145a-26: mtshan sogs dpe byad bzang pos mdzes //
T02D1667:145a-28: rin chen la sogs rgyan phreng tshogs //
T02D1667:145a-29: dar gyi gas rgyan cod pan dpyangs //
T02D1667:145a-30: bkra shis skyil krung legs bzhugs shing //
T02D1667:145a-31: snyems bcad chags pa'i tshul du gzigs //
T02D1667:145a-32: rang 'od ngo bo las byung pa'i //
T02D1667:145a-33: na bza' dkar mo dkar gsal mdangs //
T02D1667:145a-34: zhal gcig phyag gnyis padma dang //
T02D1667:145a-35: thod pa bdud rtsis gang ba 'dzin //
T02D1667:145a-36: rin chen rgyan sogs phreng ba dang //
T02D1667:145a-37: na bza' dril bu'i rked cings can //
T02D1667:145a-38: phyung nas byin gyis brlabs mdzad de //
T02D1667:145a-39: thabs dang shes rab ldan par gyur //
T02D1667:145a-40: gnas bzhi yi ge mtshan ma sngags //
T02D1667:145a-41: dkyil 'khor gdan la lags gnas rnams //
T02D1667:145a-42: spro dang bsdu pa'i rim pa yis //
T02D1667:145a-43: phyag rgya bzhi yis rnam par gsal //
T02D1667:145a-44: lha mo'i bum pas khrus byas te //
T02D1667:145a-45: dbang bskur rigs kyi bdag por bsam //
T02D1667:145a-46: hr'i:las skyes pa'i ling ga ni //
T02D1667:145a-47: padma gsang lam phat kyis mtshan //
T02D1667:145a-48: aa yis dag byas bha ga'i dbyibs //
T02D1667:145b-1: sna tshogs barda yis bskul byas nas //
T02D1667:145b-2: thabs shes gnyis med rol par mdzad //
T02D1667:145b-5: byang chub sems kyi 'od zer gyis //
T02D1667:145b-6: phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor rab mnyes par //
T02D1667:145b-7: lha rnams rang la gzhug bya ste //
T02D1667:145b-8: gnyis ka'i dga' rab tu spel //
T02D1667:145b-9: khams gsum 'gro gnas dag pa dang //
T02D1667:145b-10: rnal 'byor mtshan ma rab tu spyang //
T02D1667:145b-11: gsang ba'i gnas su gzhal yas khang //
T02D1667:145b-12: rgyan tshogs gdan rnams sngon bzhin byung //
T02D1667:145b-13: thig le gnas su mtshan byas nas //
T02D1667:145b-14: spros pas yi ge'i dkyil 'khor gsal //
T02D1667:145b-15: gsang gnas dbus kyi padma la //
T02D1667:145b-16: hr'i:las padma gar dbang phyug / dza:las rnam par gzigs ma ste //
T02D1667:145b-17: h'um las de bzhin sgrol ma yin //
T02D1667:145b-18: bam las lha mo sa 'dzin te //
T02D1667:145b-19: de bzhin ho:yis khro gnyer ma //
T02D1667:145b-20: h'um gis gtum pa'i dbang phyug ste //
T02D1667:145b-22: aa las padma'i na bza' ma //
T02D1667:145b-23: ho las padma'i dbang phyug ma'o //
T02D1667:145b-24: de dag nang gi phyogs bzhi dang //
T02D1667:145b-25: phyi nas padma'i phyogs bzhir ro //
T02D1667:145b-26: aom las gling bu tram pi wang //
T02D1667:145b-27: pam las rnga chen dza rdza rnga //
T02D1667:145b-28: me mtshams la sogs 'dab ma bzhir //
T02D1667:145b-29: lha mo bzhi ni gnas pa yin //
T02D1667:145b-30: aa a'a me tog spos me ma //
T02D1667:145b-31: aom a'a:mar me dri chab ma //
T02D1667:145b-32: bar mtshams khyams kyi gnas bzhi ru //
T02D1667:145b-33: lha mo bzhin gnas pa yin //
T02D1667:145b-34: dza las rta mgrin 'phang mtho ma //
T02D1667:145b-35: h'um las phag gdong mche ba can //
T02D1667:145b-36: bam las nyi zla mi 'bar ma //
T02D1667:145b-37: ho: las thal byed sgo bzhir gnas //
T02D1667:145b-38: aom sva bh'a ba shuddho badma nerte shva ri hr'i:dza:/
T02D1667:145b-39: rang gi gnas nas spro byas te //
T02D1667:145b-40: slar 'dus yab yum lus la gzhug / aom sarba ta th'a ga ta padma dza //
T02D1667:145b-41: rnam gzigs padma r'a ga'i mdog / padma mar po kha 'byed mjad //
T02D1667:145b-43: sgrol ma ljang gu g-yon dkur brten //
T02D1667:145b-46: sa 'dzin sngon mo rgyan can ma //
T02D1667:145b-49: khro gnyer dkar mo mdung rtse gsum //
T02D1667:145b-50: padma mthing ga skyod par byed //
T02D1667:145b-51: h'um padma tsande shva ri h'um phat /
T02D1667:146a-1: gtu ma dbang phyug gangs ri'i mdog / padma dmar po tri sh'u la //
T02D1667:146a-2: ha ma bi shva padma mu ge si ta h'um phat /
T02D1667:146a-3: sna tshogs padma ljang gu'i mdog / padma 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad 'dzin //
T02D1667:146a-5: padma na bza' gser gyi mdog / padma ser po chu srin rgyal ;
T02D1667:146a-6: / ho padme sha kra ma h'um dza /
T02D1667:146a-7: padma'i dbang phyug dmar ba'i mdog / padma le brgyan rdo rtse lnga //
T02D1667:146a-8: he ra ti padma bi si tra tha /
T02D1667:146a-9: gling bu sngon mo sna tshogs sgra //
T02D1667:146a-10: padmas mtshan pa'i gling bu sgrogs //
T02D1667:146a-11: he ra ti padma ge te ta te te /
T02D1667:146a-12: pi wang ser mo drug ldan dbyangs //
T02D1667:146a-13: padmas mtshan pa'i pi wang bsgrang //
T02D1667:146a-14: he ra ti padma h'a sa ham /
T02D1667:146a-15: rnga chen dmar mo padma'i rnga //
T02D1667:146a-16: phrin las so so'i tshul bzhin brdung //
T02D1667:146a-17: he ra ti padma nir tye pe pa pa dzam /
T02D1667:146a-18: rdza rnga ljang gu rdza rnga ma //
T02D1667:146a-19: padmas mtshan pa'i rol stobs tshul //
T02D1667:146a-21: me tog dkar ser padmas mtshan //
T02D1667:146a-22: rin chen gzhong pa bkang ba 'dzin //
T02D1667:146a-24: spos me dkar sngon bdug pa'i snod //
T02D1667:146a-27: mar me dmar mo padmas mtshan //
T02D1667:146a-28: snong mang mar me'i sdong po 'dzin //
T02D1667:146a-30: dri chab ljang skya padmas mtshan//
T02D1667:146a-33: rta gdong dkar mo lcags kyu dang //
T02D1667:146a-34: thod pa rta mgo ljang gu 'dzin //
T02D1667:146a-36: phag gdong sngon mo g-yas mche ba //
T02D1667:146a-38: aom badzra shrim kha le bam /
T02D1667:146a-39: snang ba mo dmar phyag gnyis kyis //
T02D1667:146a-40: lcags sgrog nyi ma zla bas mtshan //
T02D1667:146a-42: thal byed ljang gu g-yas dril bu //
T02D1667:146a-43: g-yon pa thod pa g-yas pa'i sku //
T02D1667:146a-44: kun kyang rgyan phreng na bza' dang //
T02D1667:146a-45: rigs kyi mtshan ma 'gying bag bzhin //
T02D1667:146a-46: 'dzum steg dgod pa'i so zur ston //
T02D1667:146a-47: rang gi cha lugs gar gyis gnas //
T02D1667:146a-48: mgon po ro mnyam la zhugs nas //
T02D1667:146a-49: chos dbyings ye shes snyoms 'jug las //
T02D1667:146a-50: lha mos bdag po bskul mdzad de //
T02D1667:146a-51: sems can kun don rnam 'phrul mdzad //
T02D1667:146a-52: brten pa'i dkyil 'khor lha rnams kyi //
T02D1667:146b-0: skye mched drug la sangs rgyas @146b drug ;
T02D1667:146b-1: / phyag rgya bzhi yis mtshan ma dang //
T02D1667:146b-2: rigs kyi bdag pos nye bar mtshan //
T02D1667:146b-3: thugs ka'i 'od zer lcags kyu yis //
T02D1667:146b-4: ye shes dkyil 'khor bskul mdzad de //
T02D1667:146b-5: dza:h'um bam ho:'i sbyor tshogs dang //
T02D1667:146b-6: rdo rje bsdu ba'i phyag rgya bcing //
T02D1667:146b-7: stong pa shin tu yod med rnal 'byor mthu ;
T02D1667:146b-8: / nam mkha' nyid du dam tshig nges par gnas //
T02D1667:146b-9: bde gshegs bde bar gshegs pa bzhengs su gsol //
T02D1667:146b-10: padma gar dbang skal bzang dpal khyod bdag / dza:h'um bam ho:ae hye hi bha ga b'an /
T02D1667:146b-11: ma h'a ka ru ni ka dri shya ho //
T02D1667:146b-15: 'gro ba ma lus bsgral ba'i phyir //
T02D1667:146b-16: don gyi dbang gis dgongs nas kyang //
T02D1667:146b-17: 'khor bcas gshags shing bzhugs su gsol //
T02D1667:146b-19: sgyu 'phrul dga' ba'i rdo rje rol mo'i tshogs //
T02D1667:146b-20: gzhan la snang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par mdzes//
T02D1667:146b-22: tshangs pa'i tshogs rnams zil gyis mnon mdzad cing //
T02D1667:146b-23: rtog pa du ma'i sgro 'dogs gcod par mdzad //
T02D1667:146b-25: gnyis mad ye shes gnyis can rnam mtha' yas //
T02D1667:146b-26: snang stong bde chen mnyam nyid dbyings las rol //
T02D1667:146b-28: kun 'byung yon tan rtsol med lhun grub snang //
T02D1667:146b-29: rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor rnam dgod rang las byung //
T02D1667:146b-31: mdzad pa rgya chen 'gog med kun grub pas //
T02D1667:146b-32: tshogs bcas rol pas bya ba kun rdzogs pa //
T02D1667:146b-34: sku gsung thugs kyi yon tan phrin las brgyan //
T02D1667:146b-35: dkyil 'khor mdzes pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1667:146b-38: rang gi snying gar bcing bya ste //
T02D1667:146b-39: mthe bong mthe'u chung padma bzhin //
T02D1667:146b-40: rgyas par 'dud pa'i phyag kyang bya //
T02D1667:146b-42: bandha n'am k'a ro ya mi /
T02D1667:146b-45: aom 'byung ba che las thams cad 'byung //
T02D1667:146b-46: stong gsum rdul snyed ma lus pa'i //
T02D1667:146b-47: gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya chos //
T02D1667:146b-48: lha mo'i tshogs rnams ma lus sgro //
T02D1667:146b-49: me tog bdug pa mar me dang //
T02D1667:146b-50: dri tshogs kun gyis mchod par bya //
T02D1667:146b-51: aom pa na pe na pa nu su ra ta /
T02D1667:147a-7: shr'i bha ga b'an kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi /
T02D1667:147a-8: lag pa g-yas g-yon gnyis dag gi //
T02D1667:147a-9: mdzub mo mthe'u chung mdzes bsgyur te //
T02D1667:147a-10: g-yas g-yon thal mo brdabs pa yis //
T02D1667:147a-11: mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya //
T02D1667:147a-12: te zhes bya ba klu yi rgya //
T02D1667:147a-13: thams cad dag pas rab bsgrub pa'o //
T02D1667:147a-16: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
T02D1667:147a-17: 'dod chags thams cad rnam dag phyir //
T02D1667:147a-18: padma'i phyag rgya dpal du gnas //
T02D1667:147a-19: mi 'gyur dam pa dag bya'i phyir //
T02D1667:147a-20: shel sgor bzhin du dag pa'o //
T02D1667:147a-21: 'dod chags thams cad bsal ba'i phyir //
T02D1667:147a-23: sangs rgyas tshe yi rin chen spras //
T02D1667:147a-24: gos dang sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan //
T02D1667:147a-25: sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa yis //
T02D1667:147a-26: bde ba can bzhin dam par 'gyur //
T02D1667:147a-27: gar thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis //
T02D1667:147a-28: yongs su bsgyur cing gar byas pa //
T02D1667:147a-30: phyag ni rgya rnams 'khor lo bskor //
T02D1667:147a-31: g-yas dang g-yon gyi sbyor ba yis //
T02D1667:147a-32: skyil mo krung ni phyed mar gnas //
T02D1667:147a-33: rgyal ba'i skyil mo krung bcas nas //
T02D1667:147a-34: sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar byed //
T02D1667:147a-35: aom sva bh'a wa shuddha padma na rte shva ri hr'i:dza /
T02D1667:147a-36: snyems pa'i lag pa g-yon pa yis //
T02D1667:147a-37: padma dmar po ci bder gzung //
T02D1667:147a-39: rnam par gzigs pa'i rnam dag dpal //
T02D1667:147a-40: snyems pa'i lag pa g-yon pa yis //
T02D1667:147a-41: padma sngon po ci bder gzung //
T02D1667:147a-42: snying gar 'dren tshul bud med rgya //
T02D1667:147a-43: sgrol ba'i byang chub mchog yin no //
T02D1667:147a-44: snyems pa'i lag pa g-yon pa yis //
T02D1667:147a-45: padma dkar po ci bder gzung //
T02D1667:147a-46: 'khor lo'i rgya bcings rab tu bskor //
T02D1667:147a-48: snyems pa'i lag pa g-yon pa yis //
T02D1667:147a-49: padma mthing ga ci bder gzung //
T02D1667:147a-50: g-yas pa gar byed ba dan gsum //
T02D1667:147a-51: khro gnyer ma yi phyag rgya yin //
T02D1667:147a-52: snyems pa'i lag pa g-yon pa yis //
T02D1667:147a-53: padma dmar po ci bder gzung// g-yas pa tri sh'ul tshul du bsgreng //
T02D1667:147b-0: pad gtum dbang @147b phyug bde gnon rgya //
T02D1667:147b-1: snyems pa'i lag pa g-yon pa yis //
T02D1667:147b-2: padma ljang gu ci bder gzung //
T02D1667:147b-3: g-yas pas 'khor lo rtse brgyad bstod //
T02D1667:147b-4: padma dbang phyug thugs kyi rgya //
T02D1667:147b-5: snyems pa'i lag pa g-yon pa yis //
T02D1667:147b-6: padma ser po ci bder gzung //
T02D1667:147b-7: g-yas pas gar byed chu srin bsgreng //
T02D1667:147b-8: padmo gnas pa'i dpal chen yin //
T02D1667:147b-9: snyems pa'i lag pa g-yon pa yis //
T02D1667:147b-10: padma le brgan ci bder gzung //
T02D1667:147b-11: snying gar 'dren tshul rdo rje'i rgya //
T02D1667:147b-12: 'dod pa'i dbang mo'i go ba gsum //
T02D1667:147b-13: gling bu ma sogs lha mo yi //
T02D1667:147b-14: phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin //
T02D1667:147b-15: rang byung lha mo dang bcas pa'i //
T02D1667:147b-16: phyag rgya sngags gnyis gnyis med gyur //
T02D1667:147b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa kun la sogs //
T02D1667:147b-18: sa yi gzugs sogs sna tshogs 'dzin //
T02D1667:147b-19: sems can rnam pa sna tshogs rnams //
T02D1667:147b-20: 'dul mchog dngos grub mchog mnga' ba //
T02D1667:147b-21: sems dpa' padma'i dga' ba mchog / sgyu ma'i dga' ba bstan du gsol //
T02D1667:147b-23: kye gar dbang thar pa'i dga' ba gar mdzod cig
T02D1667:147b-24: / sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bdag / tshangs
T02D1667:147b-25: pa 'jug sel dbang phyug bdag / nyi zla bdag
T02D1667:147b-27: padmo sgyu ma dpal rnams sna tshogs 'dul mdzad dag pa'i tshul gyis gar byed pa //
T02D1667:147b-28: padmo dam tshig dbang phyug sangs rgyas gar rnams mdzad du gsol //
T02D1667:147b-29: 'dod chags rnam par sbyong ba thams cad da rung rnam par sbyongs //
T02D1667:147b-30: padmo 'dzin pas mngon sum spyan sngar gar mkhan gar mdzod cig / so so'i ljags kyi padma la //
T02D1667:147b-31: mtshan ma chos kyi snying por bcas //
T02D1667:147b-32: aom t'a re tuta t'a re tu re sv'ah'a //
T02D1667:147b-33: rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar nas //
T02D1667:147b-34: gung mo mnyam par rab tu sgrub //
T02D1667:147b-35: mthe bong mthe'u chud 'dab ma bzhi //
T02D1667:147b-36: padma dri med rab tu rgyas //
T02D1667:147b-37: sngags bcas gnas su gzhag bya sta //
T02D1667:147b-38: rim bzhin mtha' nas dgrol bar bya'o //
T02D1667:147b-40: rab tu dga' ba'i bdag la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1667:147b-41: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad grub par mdzod //
T02D1667:147b-42: dam tshig dam pa grub par mdzad du gsol //
T02D1667:147b-43: mchod pa chen po thams cad dag par mdzod //
T02D1667:147b-44: mchod pa chen po thams cad grub par mdzod //
T02D1667:148a-0: @148a * // mnyam pa chen po'i gnas la rol du gsol //
T02D1667:148a-1: la lar rab tu drag cing skye bo dag la drag pa'i bud med sku ltar rab tu snang //
T02D1667:148a-2: 'gro ba mtha' yas 'dul phyir la lar rab tu rno ba'i 'khor lo phyag na bsnams pa'i sku //
T02D1667:148a-3: la lar rab tu des shing zhi ba mi 'gyur sbyin pa tshangs pa'i skur yang ston par mdzod //
T02D1667:148a-4: la lar rab tu 'bar ba'i chags pa padmo'i rgyal po'i dam tshig bdag la grub par mdzod //
T02D1667:148a-5: steg la sogs pa'i nyams dang ldan //
T02D1667:148a-6: mdzes pa'i bzhin ni rnam sgyur zhing //
T02D1667:148a-7: rim gror byas pa steg pa'i mchog / steg pa'i lta bas gar byed do //
T02D1667:148a-8: sna tshogs bandha brtags pa la //
T02D1667:148a-9: sna tshogs bdud rtsis rnam par dgang //
T02D1667:148a-11: mtshan ma rnam pa lnga dang ldan //
T02D1667:148a-12: 'od dang du ba sgra dang dri //
T02D1667:148a-13: lha mo'i gzugs ston bdud rtse 'grub //
T02D1667:148a-14: rang 'byung gdod nas rnam par dag / mnyam pa'i don ldan rol par mdzod //
T02D1667:148a-15: byin brlabs rgyan dang mtshan ldan pa'i //
T02D1667:148a-16: mi mo rnams kyi reg bya'i mchog / byin gyis brlab cing rnal 'byor pa //
T02D1667:148a-17: gsang ba chen po rnam par rol //
T02D1667:148a-18: grub pa'i rdzas 'di thams cad la //
T02D1667:148a-19: h'um dang phat kyis ldan par mdzod //
T02D1667:148a-20: mnyam nyid mi g-yo la sogs pa'i//
T02D1667:148a-21: bstod pa'i glu rnams blang byas nas //
T02D1667:148a-22: sil snyan rnams kyi sgra rnams dang //
T02D1667:148a-23: gar gyis lha rnams mnyes par byas //
T02D1667:148a-27: bdag cag dam tshig 'di la mngon du zhugs pa rnams //
T02D1667:148a-28: bcad gtu bas lus la 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing //
T02D1667:148a-29: grib ma phog pa'i sdug bsngal mi bzod pa //
T02D1667:148a-30: sku yi phyogs tsam mthong bas mod la 'tsho ba dang //
T02D1667:148a-31: gzi mdangs lus la 'jug par byed ba stong phrag gis //
T02D1667:148a-32: 'od kyis phyogs pas 'jig rten khams su snang ba dang //
T02D1667:148a-33: lus ngag sems dang tshe ni rdo rjer rab tu gnas //
T02D1667:148a-34: re smon thams cad dus 'dir grub par mdzad du gsol //
T02D1667:148a-35: de nas bzlas brjod rnam gnyis sam //
T02D1667:148a-36: thig le gnyis sam phra mo gnyis //
T02D1667:148a-37: rnam dag mtshan ma gsal ba dang //
T02D1667:148a-38: mtshan ma med pa'i don bsam bya //
T02D1667:148b-0: mnyam nyid dkyil 'khor kun gyi mchog / don dam bde ba chen po'i @148b sku ;
T02D1667:148b-1: / de bzhin nyid dbyings ye shes te //
T02D1667:148b-2: lha nyid brtson pas bsgom par bya //
T02D1667:148b-3: thun ba zhis skabs su gtor ma gtang //
T02D1667:148b-4: rdzogs nas dkyil 'khor mchod bstod cing //
T02D1667:148b-5: rang las phyung ste mdun bzhag nas //
T02D1667:148b-6: gsol gdab las la bskul bar bya //
T02D1667:148b-7: aom khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad //
T02D1667:148b-8: rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol //
T02D1667:148b-9: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang //
T02D1667:148b-10: slar yang sems can don la dgongs //
T02D1667:148b-12: de nas phyag rgya rnams bkod pa //
T02D1667:148b-13: rim bzhin bdag la bsdu byas nas //
T02D1667:148b-14: rnam gsum sems dpa' h'um la thim //
T02D1667:148b-15: rim bzhin thig le mnyam pa'i dbyings //
T02D1667:148b-16: rjes 'byung mtshan ma'i skur gnas te //
T02D1667:148b-17: mtshan dpe rgyan dang cha lugs gsal //
T02D1667:148b-18: go cha go bcings bsrung bya zhing //
T02D1667:148b-19: dbang bskur dbu rgyan cod pan ldan //
T02D1667:148b-21: hr'i ratna m'a le aa bhi shinytsa tram /
T02D1667:148b-22: aom pa ta lam aa bi lam ba h'um /
T02D1667:148b-23: spyod lam kun du ma nyams par //
T02D1667:148b-24: lha nyid du ni bsgom bya ste //
T02D1667:148b-25: dbang po snang ba'i yul dus rnams //
T02D1667:148b-26: dkyil 'khor rol pa'i tshul du brtag / bza' btung byin brlabs ma nyams bzlas //
T02D1667:148b-27: sgyu ma gnyis med ye shes rol //
T02D1667:148b-28: byed spyod tshogs gnyis rgyu ru brtag / thams cad 'gro ba'i don phyir spyod //
T02D1667:148b-29: rnam bkod dge ba dri med mchog / mya ngan sdug bsngal las dbugs 'byin //
T02D1667:148b-30: bkra shis bde legs 'grub byed pas //
T02D1667:148b-31: rang gi de nyid don gsal shog / dpal padma
T02D1667:148b-32: gar gyi dbang phyug gi gsang don rnam par dgod
T02D1667:148b-34: slob dpon ku ku r'a dzas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D1667:148b-36: // ; rgya gar gyi mkhan po bo dhi k'a ra sidha dang /
